resources.string:
Random New American Bible Verse is based on the New American Bible available at the United States Conference of Catholic Bishops website, usccb.org/bible.


The background image is Pope St. Damasus I. The image was taken from the website of Verde Azzurro Notizie, https://www.verdeazzurronotizie.it/, accessed on April 20, 2019.


This app is meant to give you one random New American Bible verse per day.


The verse itself is not given to you in the app; you have to get it yourself. Consider picking up a physical Bible!


Tolle et Lege!
